channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 02:32 Air anxiety in Zaporizhzhya Oblast Watch Further Messages.
item.description: 游댮 02:32 Air anxiety in Zaporizhzhya Oblast Watch Further Messages.#Zaporizhzhia_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 02:04 The alarm to Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider that the alarm is still in:- Sinelnikovsky rayon- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community- Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervonohrigor Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 02:04 The alarm to Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider that the alarm is still in:- Sinelnikovsky rayon- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community- Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervonohrigor Territorial Community#Dnipropetrovsk. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
